content: We offer a 30-day hassle-free return policy on all items. Items must be in original packaging and unused condition. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned item. Customers are responsible for return shipping unless the item was defective or we made an error.

Standard shipping is free on all orders over $50. Orders under $50 have a flat $5.99 shipping fee. Standard delivery takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping (1-2 business days) is available for $14.99. We ship to all 50 US states and select international destinations.

We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover), PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. All payments are securely processed through our encrypted payment gateway. We do not store credit card information on our servers.

All products come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty covering defects in materials and workmanship. Extended warranty options (2-year and 3-year) are available for purchase at checkout. Warranty claims can be initiated through our support portal.

Orders can be modified or cancelled within 2 hours of placement. After this window, orders enter processing and cannot be changed. To modify an order, contact support immediately with your order number. Shipping address changes may be possible before shipment.

Our customer support team is available Monday-Friday 9AM-6PM EST. Weekend support is available via email only, with responses within 24 hours. For urgent issues outside business hours, please use our online help center.
